Name: GTEC026 - GovTech Change of Landlord Agent
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","method":"POST","url":"http://{govtechpath}","show_headers":"yes","headers":"{"user":"{govtechuser}", "password":"{govtechpassword}"}","payloadType":"XML","payload":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!--Sample XML file generated by XMLSpy v2012 sp1 (x64) (http://www.altova.com)-->
<rev:CouncilTaxLandlordMove xmlns:rev="http://www.govtechsolutions.co.uk/schema/revenues" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
	<rev:Header>
		<rev:Authority>{govtechauthoritycode}</rev:Authority>
		<rev:DocumentSource>{form_name}</rev:DocumentSource>
		<rev:DocumentReference>{reference}</rev:DocumentReference>
		<rev:SubmissionDate>{today}</rev:SubmissionDate>
		<rev:Environment>LIVE</rev:Environment>
		<rev:Route>DIRECT</rev:Route>
		<rev:PDF>
            <rev:Document>{prev_data_64}</rev:Document>
		</rev:PDF>
		<rev:FormType>CTaxLandlordMove</rev:FormType>
	</rev:Header>
	<rev:Landlord>
		<rev:CompanyName>{yourDetails/Organisation_Name_out}</rev:CompanyName>
		<rev:PersonName>
			<rev:Title>{yourDetails/Title_out}</rev:Title>
			<rev:Forename>{yourDetails/First_Name_out}</rev:Forename>
			<rev:OtherNames/>
			<rev:Surname>{yourDetails/Surname_out}</rev:Surname>
		</rev:PersonName>
		<rev:EmailAddress>{yourDetails/Email_Address_out}</rev:EmailAddress>
		<!--@af:if({yourDetails/Phone_Number_out} != '') -->
			<rev:TelephoneNumber>{yourDetails/Phone_Number_out}</rev:TelephoneNumber>
		<!--@endaf:if -->
		<!--@af:if({yourDetails/Phone_Number_out} = '') -->
			<rev:TelephoneNumber>{yourDetails/Mobile_Number_out}</rev:TelephoneNumber>
		<!--@endaf:if -->
		<rev:Address>
			<rev:Line1>{yourDetails/textOut1}</rev:Line1>
			<rev:Line2>{yourDetails/textOut2}</rev:Line2>
			<rev:Line3>{yourDetails/textOut3}</rev:Line3>
			<rev:Line4>{yourDetails/textOut4}</rev:Line4>
			<!--@af:if({yourDetails/AddressIn} != 2) -->
				<rev:Postcode>{yourDetails/upPostcode_out}</rev:Postcode>
			<!--@endaf:if -->
			<!--@af:if({yourDetails/AddressIn} = 2) -->
				<rev:NonStdPostcode>{yourDetails/upPostcode_out}</rev:NonStdPostcode>
			<!--@endaf:if -->
		</rev:Address>
	</rev:Landlord>
	<rev:Property>
		<rev:Address>
			<rev:Line1>{PropDetAdd/textOut1}</rev:Line1>
			<rev:Line2>{PropDetAdd/textOut2}</rev:Line2>
			<rev:Line3>{PropDetAdd/textOut3}</rev:Line3>
			<rev:Line4>{PropDetAdd/textOut4}</rev:Line4>
			<rev:Postcode>{PropDetAdd/postcodeUp}</rev:Postcode>
		</rev:Address>
		<rev:PropertyRef/>
		<rev:UPRN>{PropDetAdd/uprnOut}</rev:UPRN>
		<rev:Furnishing>{willThePropertyBe}</rev:Furnishing>
	</rev:Property>
	<!--@af:if({TMoveOut} = 'yes') -->
		<rev:VacatingTenantName>
			<rev:Title>{MovingOut/title}</rev:Title>
			<rev:Forename>{MovingOut/firstName}</rev:Forename>
			<rev:OtherNames/>
			<rev:Surname>{MovingOut/surname}</rev:Surname>
		</rev:VacatingTenantName>
		<rev:TenancyEndDate>{CompletionTenancyDate}</rev:TenancyEndDate>
    	<rev:MoveOutDate>{moveOutDate}</rev:MoveOutDate>
		<!--@af:if({MovToAdd/postcodeUp} != '') -->
			<rev:NewAddress>
				<rev:Line1>{MovToAdd/textOut1}</rev:Line1>
				<rev:Line2>{MovToAdd/textOut2}</rev:Line2>
				<rev:Line3>{MovToAdd/textOut3}</rev:Line3>
				<rev:Line4>{MovToAdd/textOut4}</rev:Line4>
				<!--@af:if({MovToAdd/AddressIn} != 2) -->
					<rev:Postcode>{MovToAdd/postcodeUp}</rev:Postcode>
				<!--@endaf:if -->
				<!--@af:if({MovToAdd/AddressIn} = 2) -->
					<rev:NonStdPostcode>{MovToAdd/postcodeUp}</rev:NonStdPostcode>
				<!--@endaf:if -->
			</rev:NewAddress>
		<!--@endaf:if -->
	<!--@endaf:if -->
	<!--@af:if({newTenantsCHK} != '') -->
		<rev:TenancyStartDate>{GTnewTenStart}</rev:TenancyStartDate>
		<!--@af:if({existingTennantsCHK} != 3) -->
	    	<rev:MoveInDate>{MoveInDate}</rev:MoveInDate>
	    <!--@endaf:if -->
		<rev:TotalNumberOfTenantsOver18>{countNewTenants}</rev:TotalNumberOfTenantsOver18>
		<!--@af:repeat({newTenants}) -->
			<rev:NewTenantName>
				<rev:Title>{newTenants/title}</rev:Title>
				<rev:Forename>{newTenants/firstName}</rev:Forename>
				<rev:OtherNames/>
				<rev:Surname>{newTenants/surname}</rev:Surname>
			</rev:NewTenantName>
		<!--@endaf:repeat -->
		<!--@af:if({movingFrom} = '') -->
		<!--@af:if({NumNT} != 0) -->
		<rev:PreviousAddress>
			<rev:Line1>{MovFromAdd/textOut1}</rev:Line1>
			<rev:Line2>{MovFromAdd/textOut2}</rev:Line2>
			<rev:Line3>{MovFromAdd/textOut3}</rev:Line3>
			<rev:Line4>{MovFromAdd/textOut4}</rev:Line4>
			<!--@af:if({MovFromAdd/AddressIn} != 2) -->
				<rev:Postcode>{MovFromAdd/upperPostcode}</rev:Postcode>
			<!--@endaf:if -->
			<!--@af:if({MovFromAdd/AddressIn} = 2) -->
				<rev:NonStdPostcode>{MovFromAdd/upperPostcode}</rev:NonStdPostcode>
			<!--@endaf:if -->
		</rev:PreviousAddress>
		<!--@endaf:if -->
		<!--@endaf:if -->
	<!--@endaf:if -->
	<rev:DeclarationCompleted>true</rev:DeclarationCompleted>
</rev:CouncilTaxLandlordMove>","responseType":"XML","strip_namespaces":"1","path_to_values":"","fields":"","xslt_stylesheet":"","results_page_columns":"","secure_fields_db_http":""}
